title: Kona Ouroboros Carbon Review: An Adventure-Focused Suspension Gravel Crusher
content:
Kona offers the adventure focused crowd a fairly-priced, high-value package that excels in tricky terrain well beyond flat, straight country roads.

Read the full article at Kona Ouroboros Carbon Review: An Adventure-Focused Suspension Gravel Crusher on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
